attributes.action: implement and monitor an accredited quality mark scheme for all businesses in the UK showing compliance with all equal pay legislation and further that within 2 years  the government and all public bodies be accredited and will refuse to award contracts to non-accredited  businesses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Most companies recognise the equal contribution that women make. 

Accredited firms will attract the best staff. An Equal Pay Mark will rapidly become  one of pride and quality. 

The government should take the lead and eliminate the £3000+ per annum pay difference per woman in the UK.

Equal pay can be achieved quickly if the government are committed to eliminating the pay differential.
